Convention for heading levels in Neutron devref: ======= Heading 0 (reserved for the title in a document) ------- Heading 1 ~~~~~~~ Heading 2 +++++++ Heading 3 ''''''' Heading 4 (Avoid deeper levels because they do not render well.)

section.title: Client command extension support
section.paragraph: The client command extension adds support for extending the neutron client while considering ease of creation.
The full document can be found in the python-neutronclient repository: https://docs.openstack.org/python-neutronclient/latest/contributor/client_command_extensions.html
